name: World War Tank Parking - Historical Battle Machine Real Assault Driving Simulator Game FREE
name_original: World War Tank Parking - Historical Battle Machine Real Assault Driving Simulator Game FREE
description:
Strap into a realistic WWII tank and get ready for some amazing Parking action. Drive your battle machine through a base and park it. Careful, there’s friendly vehicles driving around. Smash them up and it’s game over. Can you park a tank for real???

Features:
-Authentic Battle Tanks
-Incredible 3D graphics
-Dynamic Traffic system
